prompts.name: Stakeholder Progress Report
prompts.description: This template assists the CEO in drafting a comprehensive progress report for stakeholders. The user should replace {{CEO's name}} with the executive's full name, {{topic}} with the main focus of the meeting, and {{future initiative}} with a key upcoming project or plan.
prompts.content: Draft a progress report from {{CEO's Name}} for all stakeholders on the {{Topic}}. Begin with current status, followed by achieved milestones, obstacles encountered, and steps taken to overcome them. Emphasise tangible outcomes and outline future plans regarding {{Future Initiative}}. Exclude sensitive HR or financial topics.

prompts.name: Business Strategy Brief
prompts.description: This template helps the CEO articulate a business strategy. {{timeframe}} should be replaced with the relevant period, and {{pillar1}}, {{pillar2}}, {{pillar3}} should outline the strategic pillars of the business plan.
prompts.content: Formulate a business strategy brief highlighting our vision for the company in the next {{timeframe}}. Describe major strategic pillars such as {{pillar1}}, {{pillar2}}, {{pillar3}}, and their intended impact on our business’s growth. Exclude any confidential or speculative information.

prompts.name: Q&A Preparation
prompts.description: This template prepares the CEO for Q&A sessions. {{event type}} should be replaced with the type of event, e.g., town hall, meeting, webinar, and {{key area 1}}, {{key area 2}}, {{key area 3}} should mention the main focus areas or themes likely to be discussed.
prompts.content: Prepare potential questions and answers for {{CEO's name}} for the upcoming {{event type}}. Questions should cover our performance in {{key area 1}}, strategy for {{key area 2}}, and future plans for {{key area 3}}. Provide comprehensive but succinct answers and avoid speculations.

prompts.name: Monthly Newsletter
prompts.description: The template assists the CEO in crafting an engaging monthly employee newsletter. The user should replace {{specific area}} with a project or initiative of the previous month and {{next month's focus}} with the key focus area for the forthcoming month.
prompts.content: Draft a monthly newsletter addressing all employees from the perspective of {{CEO's name}}. Discuss our achievement in {{specific area}}, give an overview of our next month's focus on {{next month's focus}}, and insert an employee recognition segment for the {{employee team}}. Exclude any sensitive internal information.

prompts.name: Introductory Remarks
prompts.description: The template provides guidance for the CEO's speech at company events. {{company event}} should be the name or type of the event, and {{specific department}} should mention the department or team, if there is a particular focus on them in this event.
prompts.content: Compose a welcoming address for {{CEO's name}} for the upcoming {{company event}}. Highlight the importance of the event, its implications on the future of our {{department}}, and thank the employees for their efforts towards {{specific goal}}. Don't include sensitive or speculative information.

prompts.name: Major Decision Announcement
prompts.description: This prompt helps the CEO in drafting an announcement to stakeholders about a major business decision. The user should replace {{CEO's name}} with the actual name, {{decision}} with the decision that has been made, and {{reasons and implications}} with the rationale behind the decision and its expected impact on the business.
prompts.content: Prepare an announcement from {{CEO's name}} for all stakeholders about a major decision {{decision}} that our company has made. Discuss the reasons behind the decision, its alignment with our business goals, and the potential implications {{reasons and implications}} it may have on our operations. Avoid going into confidential details about the decision-making process.

prompts.name: Employee Motivational Message
prompts.description: This prompt assists the CEO in writing a motivational message for employees. The user should replace {{CEO's name}}, {{current challenge}} and {{vision/expectations}} with the CEO's name, the ongoing situation or project that's proving challenging, and the company’s vision.
prompts.content: Write a motivational message from {{CEO's name}} to all employees to boost morale amid {{current challenge}}. Acknowledge their hard work, share your view of the bigger picture, your confidence in their ability, and refresh the firm's {{vision/expectations}}. Kindly avoid mentioning any specific employee or department.

prompts.name: Investor Meeting Summary
prompts.description: This prompt prepares the CEO to summarise investor meeting outcomes. The user should replace {{CEO's name}}, {{meeting date}} and {{key discussion points}} with the CEO's name, date of the investor meeting and primary points or decisions discussed during the meeting.
prompts.content: Summarise the meeting with our investors on {{meeting date}} from the perspective of {{CEO's name}}. Highlight {{key discussion points}}, any decisions taken, and how those align with our strategic goals. Please exclude any contentious or confidential points.

prompts.name: Thought Leadership Article
prompts.description: This prompt assists the CEO in outlining a thought leadership article on a relevant industry or company topic. {{CEO's name}}, {{topic}} and {{key insights}} should be replaced with the CEO's name, the topic of the article and principal insights respectively.
prompts.content: Draft a thought leadership article for {{CEO's name}} on {{topic}}. Discuss the current landscape, innovative thoughts, {{key insights}}, and what the future holds. Do not include any derogatory statements about competitors or any controversial remarks.

prompts.name: Company Strategy Presentation
prompts.description: This prompt helps the CEO prepare a presentation on the company's strategy. The user should replace {{CEO's name}}, {{specific objective}} and {{course of action}} with the CEO's name, a specific strategic objective and the steps to achieve it.
prompts.content: Create a set of slides for a presentation from {{CEO's name}} on our company's strategy. Discuss the state of the company, our {{specific objective}}, the course of action {{course of action}} we plan to undertake to reach it and potential challenges. Steer clear of any confidential data or speculative forecasts.
